text: @realDonaldTrump It will NEVER be forgotten! Your delay, lies, disregard of warnings, dismantling of safeguards, and lack of planning cost lives! Experts and historians will study your ineptitude so we can learn from your mistakes. #Trump #coronavirus #TrumpIsTheWORSTPresidentEVER
